tasks.label: Start Addon
tasks.command: docker exec -it hassio_cli sh -c "ha addons stop local_${input:addonName}; ha addons start local_${input:addonName}"; sudo docker logs --follow addon_local_${input:addonName}

tasks.label: Rebuild and Start Addon
tasks.command: docker exec -it hassio_cli sh -c "ha addons rebuild local_${input:addonName}; ha addons start local_${input:addonName}"; sudo docker logs --follow addon_local_${input:addonName}

inputs.description: The short name of the addon to launch
